content.rendered:
6Valley FAQs

Explore our FAQ section to find answers to what we get asked about 6Valley.

General Pre-Purchase Support License Questions Payment & Pricing

General

What is 6Valley?

6Valley is a complete multi-vendor eCommerce solution. With 6Valley, you can create, manage and sustain your eCommerce business by selling digital & physical products.

Can you customize the 6Valley solution for me?

Of course, we can! Learn more about our customization services and call for customization right away. 

How can I update my solution?

6Valley offers lifetime FREE updates. 

To update 6Valley, please log in to your Admin Panel. Go to System Setup, click software update, and upload the updated file. You’ll get the updated file on your CodeCanyon dashboard. And your solution will be updated.

Pre-Purchase

Can I customize the source code?

Yes, you can. 

Which installation plan should I choose?

You can choose the installation plan that meets your requirements. But we recommend our ‘Enterprise Plan’ as it covers A to Z installation services with a single payment.

Do you offer software installation and setup services?

Certainly! Contact our support team for installation and setup services, and we will assign our best software developer to your service. 

How many languages can I integrate with 6Valley?

You can integrate unlimited languages with the 6Valley solution. 

Do you provide documentation?

Indeed! You can view the detailed documentation here. 

Support

How can I contact your customer support?

To contact our customer support, you can create a support ticket, and we’ll reach out to you. 

How much does your support ticket cost?

Our support ticket is FREE! 

What is your support policy?

Read our detailed support policy here. 

Do you provide technical support?

Yes. As per CodeCanyon’s support policy, we provide 6 months of technical support. 

License Questions

What’s the difference between a regular license & extended license?

Check out our product pricing page to know the difference between them and which license is best for you. 

Can I purchase a license for my clients?

Of course, you can. 

I want multiple licenses. what should I do?

You can always purchase multiple licenses from CodeCanyon. 

Can I use one license for multiple domains?

No, it’s not possible to use one license for multiple domains. To use multiple domains, you must purchase multiple licenses. 

Payment & Pricing

How can I change my installation plan?

To change your installation plan, please contact our support team. 

What are your installation plans?

Learn more about our installation plans here. 

What’s your refund policy?

Read our refund policy here. 

Do I have to pay extra to get the latest version of 6Valley?

No. you’ll get an automatic update with the latest version of 6Valley every time we release the newest version. 

Build Your eCommerce Business with 6Valley!

Get Started
